SN this reveals a very bad (but also simple) problem in the emulated Table.  
Part of its run-away check in setFont(...) is "font == null", which is 
obviously wrong.  It should have the same run-away pattern as TableItem and 
TreeItem have when setting Fonts and Colors.  I've attached a patch that fixes 
this for Table and Tree.

I think this should go into 3.0 since it's easy for a client to hit outside of 
the ControlExample, and is an easy and safe fix.
